Introduction

Kim Yechan is a South Korean singer. She was the main vocalist of the girl group Pink Fantasy under Mydoll Entertainment. She used to be a member of the group Awe5omeBaby.

She was the contestant SingAgain3 Singer No.3 on the JTBC survival show "Sing Again 3" in 2023. She left MyDoll Entertainment on March 11th, 2024.

She became the winner of the ENA survival show "Undercover" and its ₩100 million prize on March 16, 2025.
